scripts.myinstall: cp package.json package.json.bak && npm install && mv package.json.bak package.json || (mv package.json.bak package.json && false)
scripts.myci: cp package.json package.json.bak && cp package-lock.json package-lock.json.bak && npm install --no-audit && npm run tcm && mv package.json.bak package.json || (mv package.json.bak package.json && false) && mv package-lock.json.bak package-lock.json || (mv package-lock.json.bak package-lock.json && false)
scripts.mylock: cp package.json package.json.bak && npm install --packagelock-only && mv package.json.bak package.json || (mv package.json.bak package.json && false)
scripts.mypublish: cp package.json out/compiled/src && npm publish out/compiled/src
scripts.build: tcm -p '**/*.m.?(s)css' src && tsc -p . --outDir out/compiled && npm run copy-artefacts
scripts.test: npm run clean && npm run build && npm run test-unit && npm run test-shots
scripts.copy-artefacts: (find src -type f && find test -type f) | grep -E -v  '\.tsx$'  | grep -E -v  '[^d]\.ts$' | grep -E -v  '[^.]d\.ts$' | xargs -I % sh -c 'mkdir -p $(dirname out/compiled/%) && cp % out/compiled/%'
scripts.test-shots: npm run storybook-build && npm run jest-run-shots
scripts.jest-run-all: npm run shot-server-start && jest --config=build-tools/jest.config.all.js && npm run shot-server-stop || (npm run shot-server-stop && false)
scripts.jest-run-shots: npm run shot-server-start && jest --config=build-tools/jest.config.shots.js && npm run shot-server-stop || (npm run shot-server-stop && false)
scripts.jest-update-snapshots: npm run shot-server-start && jest --updateSnapshot --config=build-tools/jest.config.shots.js && npm run shot-server-stop || (npm run shot-server-stop && false)
scripts.shot-server-stop: kill $(ps -fA | grep http-server | grep -v grep | awk '{print $1;}')
